channel.title: Experiece multipliers wont work!
channel.description: When I mine/chop a ore/tree, the first time I get like 40k exp, but after I already choped/mined once since the server is on I allways get 54 xp, I reset the server, and only the first mine/chop gives me 40k exp, the rest gives me like nothing (real rs experience) I can give admin/head admin or pay 3$ or give 2M RSGP, Anything... But I really need this bug fixed, my server is on a 7GB dedi, I really gotta fix this :(

item.title: Experiece multipliers wont work!
item.dc:creator: @dzertus dzertus
item.description:
